Description.Text: Facilities With its range of services and facilities, the hotel ensures travellers a pleasant and comfortable stay. The establishment comprises a total of 13 rooms. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Rooms A range of amenities complete the standard fittings of the accommodation units. Facilities include a safe and WiFi. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an indoor pool are available to travellers. The hotel offers a spa (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
